channel.title: Need help with my landscape
channel.description: i added a new land place :P and i get this error [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2uz6vzm.jpg[/img] this is before i start my client and try and get on, the coords for my island is 280,700 its around the draynor mage place, i know i ask alot of questions but i appreciate everyone helping me thanks [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Stick to one topic...[/center]

item.title: Need help with my landscape
item.dc:creator: @rocky_rose rocky_rose
item.description:
@rocky_rose wrote:

To create a roof, go to Brushes and scroll down until you see ‘Others’ and select the ‘Roof’ brush. If you want to see where you placed your roof on your landscape, click ‘Advanced’ at the top left and select ‘Show Roofs’. This should show where you placed your roof with a yellow outline of a square.

Unfortunately, the editor your using (assuming it’s the RSC Community Landscape Editor by xEnt/Vrunk/Peter) doesn’t have all of the brushes, overlays, walls, and textures so if you want different styled walls or roofs, you’ll have to copy and paste them from a landscape that has them. The default brush tile for now is this:

Hope that helps, and good luck with your landscape lol k.

Read full topic
